name: Room (tea_mori)
description:
Trapped and alone with whatever lurks in the shadows, your only clue to escape is a strange pulsating light. Armed with only a flashlight and your wits, solve puzzles to escape before you time runs out. 

In this first person survival horror, solve puzzles to move from one room to the next. But remember, you only have 60 seconds to do each task. Any longer and the darkness will overtake you. Good luck!

A submission for the Scream FM scream zone game jam.
